com.mumfrey.liteloader.modconfig

Class AbstractConfigPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mumfrey.liteloader.modconfig.AbstractConfigPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigPanel

    public abstract class AbstractConfigPanel
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigPanel
    A general-purpose base class for mod config panels which implements a lot of the boilerplate needed to create a simple config panel. This should make it easier for mods which only need to provide a couple of options to do so without having to write a mountain of code.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  AbstractConfigPanel.ConfigOptionListener<T extends GuiButton>
      A callback for a control click event.
      static interface  AbstractConfigPanel.ConfigTextField
      A handle to an option text field, used to get and retrieve text and set the max length.

                        int x,
                        int y,
                        int width,

                        java.lang.String... lines)
        Add a label to the panel
        Parameters:
        id - label id
        x - label x position
        y - label y position
        width - width for the label, currently unused
        height - height for the label, used to calculate display height
        colour - label colour
        lines - text for the label
